com.nordicid.nurapi

Class NurInventoryExtendedFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.NurInventoryExtendedFilter

  • public class NurInventoryExtendedFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    Extended inventory function filter parameters. Represents G2 Select command, see UHF G2 standard section 6.3.2.11.1.1.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int action
      Indicates whether matching tags assert or deassert SL, or set their inventoried flag to A or B.

      Matching tags: do nothing.
      static int FILTER_ACTION_3
      Matching tags: negate SL or invert inventoried session flag (A to B, B to A).
